Phase Paragon does not exist and cannot hurt you.
Low-tech is cringe. This loading tip brought to you by Tri-Tachyon.
Pillage, then burn. Not the other way around.
Never turn your back on an enemy. Unless you have omni shields, and then turn all you want.
Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from a big gun.
That which does not kill you has made a tactical error.
If it's stupid and it works, it's still stupid.
The pen is mightier than the sword, as long as you use it to write production orders for more swords.
If you put reinforced bulkheads and converted hangar on an Apogee, this mod will log your address and notify the police.
If you see this tip and Iron Shell has been released, congratulations. What's it like living in the future?
